page.title: 12FASHION-a junior view
page.content: Ladies today wear dresses and skirts which go down to their knees. They grow their hair long or short, some ladies have curly hair. They can go to a jewelers and have their ears pierced so they can wear ear-rings. Most ladies wear blouses and jumpers. They can wear trousers and shorts as well. Some ladies like to wear make up on their faces to make them look nice. Men wear suits, some wear ties round their necks. Men have short hair and when they don't wear a suit they just wear trousers and a jacket or jumper. At home they wear shorts as well. Bous wear trousers with jumpers and shirts. When it is hot they wear shorts and T shirts. Girls wear dresses down to their knees. They can wear trousers and shorts with a cardigna and a T shirt.
